cab.content: BATTLE SITU ATI Oil - NOON - MAX 2nd, 1918.1. An artillery barrage was put down tills morning by the enemy at TILLERS BRETONHEUX. Ho infantry attack developed.2. There was also considerable shelling in the neighbourhood Of MERRIS and east of line ROBECQ, - ST4 VENANT, but no attack developed,5. There is nothing of interest to report from tho remainder of the front.General Staff,War Office, S.Wa. 2nd May, 1918.Issued at 12.25 p.m*
